product_name: PetSafe® Healthy Pet Simply Feed™ Automatic Pet Feeder
product_description:
product highlights

The PetSafe Healthy Pet Simply Feed, Automatic Dog and Cat Feeder is a convenient, automatic feeder that makes it easy to feed your dog or cat on time. product_name: PetSafe® Current Replacement Filters - 4 Pack
product_description:
product highlights

Keep the water in your pet's fountain clean and healthy with PetSafe Current replacement Carbon Filters. These filters help to remove bad tastes and odors, keeping your pet's water fresh so he can hydrate in healthy fashion.

Features:

  • Removes bad tastes and odors, keeping water fresh
  • Duo-density polyester pad catches hair and debris
  • Activated carbon made from coconut shells
  • Filters extend the life of your fountain

    Includes: 4-pack
    Intended For: For use with all PetSafe Current Pet Fountain sizes
    Material(s): Carbon
    Color: Black, White
    Instructions:
    1. Rinse the carbon filter prior to use. This will remove any loose carbon dust form the filter, which is harmless to your pet.
    2. Insert the carbon filter. The filter will fit between the two triangular slots to the right of the pump. Make sure it is pushed all the way down and that the black side of the carbon filter is facing toward the pump.
    3. Replace the filter every 2-4 weeks. Replace more frequently when using the fountain for multiple pets or pets that produce a lot of saliva.

    Caution: Please discontinue use if any part becomes loose or broken.

    Care Instructions: Clean using a pet-safe dish soap, hot water then towel dry. This product is NOT dishwasher safe.

    Assembly Instructions:
    1. From the back, unscrew bolt from threaded piece. Next, remove the funnel piece and set aside.

    4. Next, fill kennel cup with fresh water.
